message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. After considering your interest, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable product.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and my budget.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $825000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more counteroffer, Alice. I'm still a bit above your latest price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and my budget.
